Interface CliffordProduct

All Known Implementing Classes:
GProduct
public interface CliffordProduct
This interface represents the 'contract' obeyed by a geometric product in cladosG. Most of the interface focuses upon gettor methods that return pieces of a product table, but there are a few convenience methods too that support grade information and ranges within the underlying basis. Finally there are also a few methods for dealing with signature strings and XML output.

The farther one gets from basic methods delivering 'results' and 'signs', the more one is wandering off into conveniences.

Version:
2.0
Author:
Dr Alfred W Differ

  • Method Details

    • validateSignature

      static boolean validateSignature(String pSg)
      Return a measure of the validity of the Signature string. A string with +'s and -'s will pass. No other one does.
      This method also establishes the internal integer representation of the signature.
      Parameters:
      pSg - String
      Returns:
      boolean This boolean states whether the GProduct signature is valid.

    • getACommuteSign

      int getACommuteSign(int pRow, int pCol)
      Return a measure of whether blades pj and pk anticommute. Return a 1 if they anticommute. Return a 0 otherwise.
      Parameters:
      pRow - int
      pCol - int
      Returns:
      int

    • getBasis

      Basis getBasis()
      Basic Get method for the Basis generated by the signature of this GProduct.
      Returns:
      Basis

    • getBladeCount

      int getBladeCount()
      Get the linear dimension of the vector space that uses the associated Basis.
      Returns:
      int

    • getCommuteSign

      int getCommuteSign(int pRow, int pCol)
      Return a measure of whether blades pj and pk commute. Return a 1 if they commute. Return a 0 otherwise.
      Parameters:
      pRow - int
      pCol - int
      Returns:
      int

    • getGradeCount

      byte getGradeCount()
      Get the grade count of the algebra that uses this GProduct.
      Returns:
      byte

    • getGradeRange

      int[] getGradeRange(byte pGrade)
      Get start and end index from the GradeRange array for grade pGrade.
      Parameters:
      pGrade - short primitive = grade for which the range is needed
      Returns:
      int[] start and end indexes returned for particular grade

    • getPScalarRange

      int[] getPScalarRange()
      Get start and end index from the GradeRange array for the highest grade. Both indexes will be the same.
      Returns:
      int[] start and end indexes returned highest grade

    • getResult

      int getResult(int pRow, int pCol)
      Return an element in the geometric multiplication result table. The value will match to within a sign the index of a blade in the underlying basis.
      Parameters:
      pRow - integer index of the Left/Row blade in a product.
      pCol - integer index of the Right/Column blade in a product.
      Returns:
      integer index of a blade in the underlying basis that is the product of to two blades implied by the indexes passed in.

    • getSign

      int getSign(int pRow, int pCol)
      Return the sign of an element in the geometric multiplication result table.
      Parameters:
      pRow - integer index of the Left/Row blade in a product.
      pCol - integer index of the Right/Column blade in a product.
      Returns:
      integer of +1 or -1 depending on the sign of the product table cell.

    • signature

      String signature()
      Return the signature of the generator geometry. This lists the squares of the generators in their numeric order.
      Returns:
      String
